sentences.en: He rebelled against all authority. Life was a condition of savage freedom.
sentences.cn: 他反对一切权势, 生活应是野蛮自由的状态.

sentences.en: He received a savage blow on the head; that did for him.
sentences.cn: 他头上遭到一记猛击, 就完蛋了.

sentences.en: He was in a savage mood.
I tossed halfsick between grotesque reality and savage, frightening dreams.
sentences.cn: 我好像生病一样在狰狞的现实与可怕的噩梦之间辗转反侧.

sentences.en: In fact, Richard Savage had known Edward Bellamy a scant five hours.
sentences.cn: 实际上，理查德·萨维奇和爱德华·贝拉米相识才仅仅5个小时。

sentences.en: My name is Richard Savage, your Lordship.
sentences.cn: 尊敬的阁下，我叫理查德·萨维奇。

sentences.en: The attack is one of a series of savage sexual assaults on women in the university area.
sentences.cn: 这次袭击是在大学校园内发生的一系列针对女性的野蛮性侵犯事件中的一起。

sentences.en: The dog let out a savage howl and, wheeling round, flew at him.
sentences.cn: 那只狗发出一声凶猛的狂吠，突然转身向他扑去。

sentences.en: The most savage yells of all came from the schoolchildren.
sentences.cn: 最野蛮的喊叫声来自那些学童.

sentences.en: The poor man received a savage beating from the thugs.
sentences.cn: 那可怜的人遭到暴徒的痛打.

sentences.en: The savage civil war there could be a portent of what's to come in the rest of the region.
sentences.cn: 那里发生的野蛮内战可能预示这一地区其他地方将会发生什么。
他们射杀了一只凶残的狮子.

sentences.en: What was needed, he said, was decisive action to halt what he called these savage crimes.
sentences.cn: 他说，当务之急就是采取果断行动制止他所称的“这些野蛮罪行”。
